mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_todo SET user_id = #{loginedUserId}, cleaning = #{cleaning}, do_day = #{doDay}
mapper.select: SELECT todo_id AS todoId, cleaning, do_day AS doDay, is_checked AS isChecked FROM t_todo WHERE user_id = #{loginedUserId} AND is_del = 0 ORDER BY do_day LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
